attributes.action: STOP GARDENING GRABBING AND SAVE OUR LEAFY LANE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE ALREADY HAVE THE EXPANDING AIRPORT AND A BUSY RAILWAY LINE TO LIVE WITH PLEASE DO NOT LET BUILDERS TAKE THE BIT OF GREEN AREA WE HAVE LEFT THE AMOUNT OF NEW TRAFFIC THIS WOULD CAUSE WOULD RUIN WHAT IS LEFT OF OUR ALREADY OVER CROWDED VILLAGE

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
